argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mplrcl.p | |- P = ( I mPoly R ) |
| 2 |  | mplrcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` P ) |
| 3 |  | mplelsfi.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | mplelsfi.f | |- ( ph -> F e. B ) |
| 5 |  | mplelsfi.r | |- ( ph -> R e. V ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( I mPwSer R ) = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) = ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 6, 7, 3, 2 | #P_mplelbas | |- ( F e. B <-> ( F e. ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) /\ F finSupp .0. ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_simprbi | |- ( F e. B -> F finSupp .0. ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) |
